comment: "Payment is via PayPal, and very easy; I've even received payment a few days prior to publication. Edits are light, although they might make revisions you don't see until the piece is published. The editor is a positive, pleasant person to work with."

comment: "Pitched a story that was based on some surplus reportage I had for another story. Story was for the Daily Blog, but I hear that the Forefront section pays much more."
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "Report of no compensation for ‘guest essays’ on this ‘urban affairs’-focused blog, and no plans to change."
